title: Resolution problem HELP
body: I accidentaly put game resolutin 2560×1920 and i have blackscreen every time i join a game or load screen, how can i change it to my monitor resolution (1920 x 1080) without entering game?

replies.body:
A resolution larger than 1080 or on a 4K can cause visual issues, but don't worry. You may be able to reset your resolution through resetting your config.  Keep in mind that doing this will require you to redo your bindings as well:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

I hope that helps!
